about_the_game:
“Beyond the Ordinary” is a game that reimagines classic mini-games through a minimalist art style, world-class music, and philosophical reflections. In this unique gaming experience, ordinary things are transformed into extraordinary elements through a shift in perspective. Both the visual design and gameplay are imbued with a sense of artistry and deep contemplation.

Overview

• Visual Art: Featuring a Bauhaus or Swedish-inspired art style, the game uses minimalist geometric shapes to craft a distinctive world.

• World-Class Music: Accompanied by iconic pieces of classical music, players will experience transformed and reimagined mini-games in a serene and melodious environment.

• Philosophical Narration: The game’s narrative and descriptions are infused with philosophical insights, offering thought-provoking moments alongside entertaining gameplay.

Key Features

• Reimagined Classics: Rediscover classic mini-games with innovative twists and reworked mechanics for a fresh experience.

• Dynamic Art Style: Geometrical shapes and striking color palettes make every level a visual masterpiece.

• Music Meets Interaction: Each level is accompanied by different classical music tracks, blending seamlessly with the interactive elements for a harmonious audio-visual experience.

• Thought-Provoking Gameplay: The mini-games are not just about play; they invite players to reflect and find deeper meanings as they progress.

Experience the Extraordinary in the Ordinary

In “Beyond the Ordinary”, simplicity meets profound artistic concepts, creating a gaming experience like no other. Through shifting perspectives, discover the extraordinary within the ordinary.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M chip
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 550 or Apple M1 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Apple M chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: MD Radeon Pro 560X or Apple M1/M2 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound card
